testimonials.name: Priya R.
testimonials.text: Namma Flutter community has been instrumental in my growth as a Flutter developer. The meetups are incredibly informative!

testimonials.name: Karthik S.
testimonials.text: The hands-on workshops and collaborative environment make learning Flutter a joy. Proud to be part of this community.

testimonials.name: Deepa M.
testimonials.text: Found amazing talent and mentorship through Namma Flutter. The community is supportive and welcoming.

testimonials.name: Rahul V.
testimonials.text: From beginner to confident developer - Namma Flutter made this journey possible with their excellent guidance.
